Hundred-Handed Pillars enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
{7}{WU}: Hundred-Handed Pillars becomes a 4/6 white and blue Giant creature with vigilance until end of turn. It’s still a land. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is your devotion to white and blue. Activate only once each turn.
